title: Speed for SmartWatch
description: Speed - Measure your Speed  Shows you current/max speed going down a mountain in powder,  jumping off a cliff skydiving, out on the sea or just driving your car. • Mph• Km/h• Knots• m/s• ft/s Info:Buying or using my apps guarantees support. descriptionHTML:
Speed - Measure your Speed

Shows you current/max speed going down a mountain in powder, jumping off a cliff skydiving, out on the sea or just driving your car.

• Mph
• Km/h
• Knots
• m/s
• ft/s

Info:
Buying or using my apps guarantees support.

Note:
Works ONLY with a SmartWatch 1 and SmartWatch 2 on ANY Android phone
http://www.sonymobile.com/us/products/accessories/smartwatch

If you have an SmartWatch 3 SWR50, download my other app "Speed for Wear".

It's uses your built in GPS, so it only works outside where you can get hold of the satellites in the sky.
Also please make sure you GPS is turned ON in your Mobile in "High accuracy" Mode.

Long press to get max speed, long press again to get current speed.
